# prepend(_:)

**Instance Method**

Inserts the media items defined by the queue descriptor into the current queue immediately after the currently playing media item.

## Declaration

```swift
func prepend(_ descriptor: MPMusicPlayerQueueDescriptor)
```

## Parameters

- **descriptor**: A queue descriptor the system uses to prepend media items to the playback queue.

## Controlling playback

- **skipToNextItem()**: Starts playback of the next media item in the playback queue, or if the music player isn’t playing, designates the next media item as the next item to play.
- **skipToBeginning()**: Restarts playback at the beginning of the currently playing media item.
- **skipToPreviousItem()**: Starts playback of the previous media item in the playback queue, or if the music player isn’t playing, designates the previous media item as the next to play.
- **append(_:)**: Inserts the media items defined by the queue descriptor after the last media item in the current queue.
